main event: A military aircraft sighted an unidentified flying object flying parallel to it in the Pacific Ocean on May 13, 1954.
interesting points: The object was the largest moving object seen by the aircraft.
The object moved away to the northwest at a very rapid speed and climbing.
The sighting was reported to various military and intelligence agencies, including CINCPAC, CINCLANT, FBI, Naval Intelligence, Ramstein HVF, and Albrook AFB.
A full report was submitted to the proper authorities by the Intelligence Section at Travis Air Force Base.
The conclusion was that the object was an 'aircraft', but the report does not provide any further details about the identification of the object.
witnesses: crew of a military C-124 aircraft
